name: Wii Color Palette File
summary: Palette file used by Nintendo Wii games such as Super Smash Bros. Brawl; contains color palettes referenced by the game to help create the surface appearance of 3D models; often found within a .BRRES resource package file; similar to .TEX0 , .MDL0 , and .PAT0 files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
